Package trashday.storage

Provides the classes necessary to store user information in the Alexa session and Amazon Dynamo DB.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DynamoDao
    Trash Day data access object for DynamoDB.
    DynamoDbClient
    Client for DynamoDB persistence layer for the Trash Day skill.
    DynamoItem
    Class for storing a table item for each application user in a Dynamo DB table.
    DynamoItem.IntentLogConverter
    Class to handle serialization for IntentLog objects.
    DynamoItem.ScheduleConverter
    Class to handle serialization for Schedule objects.
    SessionDao
    Trash Day data access object for Alexa Session.

Package trashday.storage Description

Provides the classes necessary to store user information in the Alexa session and Amazon Dynamo DB. Uses Alexa session to manage user dialog and cache user data from Dynamo DB. Relies on Amazon's Dynamo DB for storing user data and on FasterXML's Jackson Project for JSON-based serialization/deserialization of the Schedule to/from the database.
Author:
J. Todd Baldwin
See Also:
Amazon DynamoDB Documentation, Java: DynamoDBMapper, FasterXML Jackson Project Home, Jackson Module: Model Versioning
